alert.note: Alert for Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh; Inland Liberty; Inland McIntosh; Long (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 3:23AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG EARLY THIS MORNING... Areas of fog will continue to develop across parts of Southeast Georgia this morning. The fog could become locally dense at time with visibilities dropping to 1/4 mile or less. The nature of the fog is such that visibilities will vary greatly over short distances with the risk for locally dense fog being the greatest near bodies of water and other low-lying areas such as marshes, swamps and large ditches. Motorists should remain alert for these conditions this morning. Some locations that could see locally dense fog include Darien, Sapelo Island, Ludowici, Glennville, Reidsville, Claxton, Hinesville and Halfmoon Landing.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down and leave extra distance ahead of you in case a sudden stop is needed.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh; Inland Liberty; Inland McIntosh; Long
